name: Look after the pennies
description:
Simple physics based game about collecting coins and bringing them to the goal.

Made for MonoGameJam3

----------------------CONTROLS----------------------

ESC - Pause

Game:

Use the mouse pointer to hit coins around

Shift - boosts the strength of the mouse pointer

Extra mode controls

------------------------------------------------------

Toy:

L-Click - spawn a coin

F - Toggle mouse pointer force on/off

-------------------------------------------------------

Editor:

click and drag - make rectangle

r - Rectangles tool

s - spawn points tool

d - death zones tool

g - goal zones tool

Ctrl-Z - undo

Ctrl-S - save

----------------------------------------------------------
